disallowed-element.reason: The small element must not be used for subheadings. https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/text-level-semantics.html#the-small-element

When a table element is the only content in a figure element other than the figcaption, the caption element should be omitted in favor of the figcaption. (https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/tables.html#the-caption-element)
